SUB_W19_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W19_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.text:
This is called the Great Tree because an
entire world is spread among its branches.
Sadly, no one knows the world's proper name.

SUB_W19_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.text:
I cannae detect the presence of civilization.
Is this a world of nature, then? Do ye truly
think I can find my heart here when there
isn't a single person about?

SUB_W19_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W19_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.text: I think that could be the very reason you will find your heart here.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_EAGLE_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_EAGLE_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Oh, what a giant eagle! And it's not taking
its eyes off me, either. Probably best I
don't avert my gaze in this situation.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_EAGLE_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_EAGLE_000_CUT_000_010.text:
It lowered its head.
Do ye wanna be friends, love?

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_EAGLE_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_EAGLE_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Ye want me to hop on? Well, I'm a fair
bit heavier than I look, but hup!

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_EAGLE_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_EAGLE_000_CUT_010_000.text:
This is incredible, eagle!
I've never been so high before.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_EAGLE_000_CUT_010_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_EAGLE_000_CUT_010_010.text:
Well, would ye look at that?
Someone made a statue of a bear.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_EAGLE_000_CUT_010_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_EAGLE_000_CUT_010_020.text:
Oh, and now I see statues of all sorts
of furry creatures. Dearie me, maybe
these aren't statues at all?

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_EAGLE_000_CUT_020_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_EAGLE_000_CUT_020_000.text:
So ye want me to save your
petrified friends, love?

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_EAGLE_000_CUT_020_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_EAGLE_000_CUT_020_020.text:
Ye want me to take seeds and bugs
and a flute? Oh, but this is mad.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_EAGLE_000_CUT_020_040.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_EAGLE_000_CUT_020_040.text:
Well, I bet the flute is for calling ye,
but what about the bugs and seeds?

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_EAGLE_000_CUT_020_080.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_EAGLE_000_CUT_020_080.text:
Ye wish me to visit that viney place?
Off we go, then!

SUB_W19_GIMK_DIVA_IVY_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_GIMK_DIVA_IVY_000_CUT_000_000.text: I can use these vines to go up.

SUB_W19_GIMK_DIVA_IVY_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_GIMK_DIVA_IVY_000_CUT_010_000.text:
This seems safe as anything to me.
So I guess when I want to go up,
I just look for vines.

SUB_W19_GIMK_DIVA_IVY_000_CUT_010_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_GIMK_DIVA_IVY_000_CUT_010_010.text:
But what if I want to go down?
Is jumping my only option?

SUB_W19_GIMK_DIVA_IVY_000_CUT_020_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_GIMK_DIVA_IVY_000_CUT_020_000.text:
The bugs are eating the vines!
Wee fellows sure are hungry...

SUB_W19_GIMK_DIVA_IVY_000_CUT_030_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_GIMK_DIVA_IVY_000_CUT_030_000.text: The vines turned into a waterfall!

SUB_W19_GIMK_DIVA_IVY_000_CUT_030_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_GIMK_DIVA_IVY_000_CUT_030_010.text:
Now I can slide down a waterfall without
damaging myself by jumping! That's grand.

SUB_W19_GIMK_DIVA_IVY_000_CUT_030_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_GIMK_DIVA_IVY_000_CUT_030_020.text:
When I want to turn vines into a waterfall,
these bugs will do it for me. But I don't
have many, so I need to use them carefully.

SUB_W19_GIMK_DIVA_IVY_000_CUT_030_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_GIMK_DIVA_IVY_000_CUT_030_030.text:
Well, I see how vines and waterfalls work,
but what are these seeds for, then?

SUB_W19_GIMK_DIVA_IVY_000_CUT_030_040.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_GIMK_DIVA_IVY_000_CUT_030_040.text:
Maybe they turn waterfalls into vines?
Aye, I should give that a try.

SUB_W19_GIMK_DIVA_IVY_000_CUT_030_060.speaker: _NOT_SPECIFIED_
SUB_W19_GIMK_DIVA_IVY_000_CUT_030_060.text: Take a stick from the beaver's lodge!

SUB_W19_GIMK_DIVA_IVY_099_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_GIMK_DIVA_IVY_099_CUT_000_000.text:
This is not what I need
to be doing right now.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_BEAVER_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_BEAVER_000_CUT_000_010.text:
One stick acquired.
Is this all I needed to do?

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_EAGLE_020_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_EAGLE_020_CUT_000_000.text:
I brought a stick back from the beaver's lodge,
so that's one objective completed. Was it ye
who gave me that task in the first place, then?

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_EAGLE_020_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_EAGLE_020_CUT_000_020.text:
With this, I should be able to more fully
explore this world. But what could I
possibly do to save all the creatures?

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_EAGLE_020_CUT_000_040.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_EAGLE_020_CUT_000_040.text:
Will ye go with me, eagle?
I may need your wings to find my heart.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_EAGLE_020_CUT_000_060.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_EAGLE_020_CUT_000_060.text:
I guess that's a nae? Aye, I'm sure ye have
better things to do than go questing with
a dafty little thing like me.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_EAGLE_020_CUT_000_080.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_EAGLE_020_CUT_000_080.text:
So I've a heart to find, and these creatures
have been petrified to boot. Can my heart
really be found in a place like this? Also,
do these creatures even have hearts?

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_TURTLE_PUSHES_TREE_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_TURTLE_PUSHES_TREE_CUT.text:
Ever since I saved the wee turtle,
my output seems to have risen.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_TURTLE_PUSHES_TREE_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_TURTLE_PUSHES_TREE_CUT.text:
I might be able to topple that withered
tree now, so let's give it a go!

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_BEAVER_CUTS_TREE_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_BEAVER_CUTS_TREE_CUT_0.text:
I wonder if there's some way I could knock
down that tree. Pushing with all my might
could do it, but I don't think it's a good idea
to expend as much energy as all that.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_BEAVER_CUTS_TREE_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_BEAVER_CUTS_TREE_CUT_0.text:
Oh, the beaver's gnawing at the trunk!
It's really weakening the tree!

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_BEAVER_CUTS_TREE_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_BEAVER_CUTS_TREE_CUT_0.text:
It shouldn't take much strength to
push it over now, so here we go!

SUB_W19_FUNC_DIVA_CHANGE_CASCADE_TO_IVY_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_FUNC_DIVA_CHANGE_CASCADE_TO_IVY_.text: This is the last of my seeds.

SUB_W19_FUNC_DIVA_CHANGE_CASCADE_TO_IVY_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_FUNC_DIVA_CHANGE_CASCADE_TO_IVY_.text: Let's turn this waterfall into vines.

SUB_W19_FUNC_DIVA_CHANGE_CASCADE_TO_IVY_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_FUNC_DIVA_CHANGE_CASCADE_TO_IVY_.text: Nae, I should think it over.

SUB_W19_FUNC_DIVA_CHANGE_IVY_TO_CASCADE_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_FUNC_DIVA_CHANGE_IVY_TO_CASCADE_.text: This is the last of my bugs.

SUB_W19_FUNC_DIVA_CHANGE_IVY_TO_CASCADE_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_FUNC_DIVA_CHANGE_IVY_TO_CASCADE_.text: Let's turn these vines into a waterfall.

SUB_W19_WRLD_DIVA_EAGLE_WHISTLE_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_WRLD_DIVA_EAGLE_WHISTLE_CUT_000_.text: So that's what I'm dealing with...

SUB_W19_WRLD_DIVA_EAGLE_WHISTLE_GAMEEND_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_WRLD_DIVA_EAGLE_WHISTLE_GAMEEND_.text: I rescued all the petrified creatures.

SUB_W19_WRLD_DIVA_EAGLE_WHISTLE_GAMEEND_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_WRLD_DIVA_EAGLE_WHISTLE_GAMEEND_.text:
Maybe I'll explore just
a wee bit more, though.

SUB_W19_FUNC_DIVA_ALL_GUARDIANS_SAVED_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_FUNC_DIVA_ALL_GUARDIANS_SAVED_CU.text: I saved all the petrified creatures.

SUB_W19_FUNC_DIVA_ALL_GUARDIANS_SAVED_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_FUNC_DIVA_ALL_GUARDIANS_SAVED_CU.text: I should go inform the eagle.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_WORLDEXIT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_WORLDEXIT_000_CUT_000_.text:
Well, have you found that heart of yours?
If you think you've done all you can,
we'd best be moving on.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_WORLDEXIT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_WORLDEXIT_000_CUT_000_.text:
There are still some petrified creatures,
but I think I'm ready to go.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_WORLDEXIT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_WORLDEXIT_000_CUT_000_.text:
I'm not leaving until everyone
is safe as houses!

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_WORLDEXIT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_WORLDEXIT_000_CUT_000_.text:
Even saving petrified creatures hasn't led
to my heart, which means there's no point
remaining on this world.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_WORLDEXIT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_WORLDEXIT_000_CUT_000_.text:
A cheery bye to ye, eagle.
Sorry I cannae help more.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEEND_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEEND_000_CUT_000_02.text:
I'm glad I was able to help others,
even being as I am.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEEND_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEEND_000_CUT_000_03.text: A cheery bye to ye, eagle.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEEND_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEEND_000_CUT_000_04.text:
Well? Were you able to sense
the hearts of the animals?

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEEND_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEEND_000_CUT_000_05.text:
Aye, they all had good hearts—but it
dinnae help clarify whether a robot
like me has one of my own.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEEND_100_CUT_000_05.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEEND_100_CUT_000_05.text:
Warning! Threat level rising!
What's this then, love!?

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEEND_100_CUT_010_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEEND_100_CUT_010_00.text: The eagle's been turned to stone!

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEEND_100_CUT_010_00.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEEND_100_CUT_010_00.text:
So this is the secret behind the
petrification! Must be one of the
rules underpinning this world.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEEND_100_CUT_010_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEEND_100_CUT_010_01.text: I've got to save the eagle!

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEEND_100_CUT_010_02.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEEND_100_CUT_010_02.text:
That duty falls not upon you, but rather the
next visitor here. It is imperative that the
National Extradimensional Exploratory
Task Force gets a move on.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEEND_100_CUT_010_03.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEEND_100_CUT_010_03.text:
Farewell, everyone. I'm so sorry
I dinnae do more for ye.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEEND_200_CUT_000_04.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEEND_200_CUT_000_04.text:
Why are ye so peeved
with me, squirrel?

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEEND_200_CUT_000_06.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEEND_200_CUT_000_06.text:
Your screech is reverberating
right through me, bat!

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEEND_200_CUT_000_08.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEEND_200_CUT_000_08.text: Even ye are cross with me, turtle?

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEEND_200_CUT_010_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEEND_200_CUT_010_00.text: The animals turned to stone! Why!?

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEEND_200_CUT_010_01.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEEND_200_CUT_010_01.text:
Because it is the way of this world that the
defeated are petrified. It's nothing you need
trouble yourself over, though, so let's cease
our explorations here and move it.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEEND_200_CUT_010_02.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEEND_200_CUT_010_02.text:
Then ta to ye all, then.
And ta to ye, Great Tree.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEEND_300_CUT_000_02.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEEND_300_CUT_000_02.text:
What are ye all so cross about?
Ach, ye leave me no choice but
to launch a counterattack!

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEEND_300_CUT_010_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEEND_300_CUT_010_00.text:
Everyone turned to stone, and it's
all my fault. I just dinnae know
what I was supposed to do!

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEEND_300_CUT_010_00.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEEND_300_CUT_010_00.text:
You did all you could; this was
an important step on the search
for your heart.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEEND_300_CUT_010_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEEND_300_CUT_010_01.text:
I'm sorry I cannae reverse your
petrification. Goodbye to ye all.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GUARDIAN_FOREST_04_STO.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GUARDIAN_FOREST_04_STO.text: Ah, this wee creature is a squirrel.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GUARDIAN_FOREST_04_STO.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GUARDIAN_FOREST_04_STO.text:
I cannae help but notice that gap
between its hands and mouth.
It looks ready to eat!

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GUARDIAN_FOREST_04_STO.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GUARDIAN_FOREST_04_STO.text:
According to my database, squirrels eat a
variety of foods including seeds, fruits,
and insects. I wonder which it was.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GUARDIAN_FOREST_04_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GUARDIAN_FOREST_04_CUT.text:
Oh, brilliant! Looks like the
walnut was the right choice.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GUARDIAN_FOREST_07_STO.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GUARDIAN_FOREST_07_STO.text:
A bear. If it's been petrified,
I should be able to gather data
from the area around it.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GUARDIAN_FOREST_07_STO.speaker: Diva_No5
Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GUARDIAN_FOREST_07_STO.text:
Ach! Its fangs are missing! It seems
to have had them when it was alive,
so I should try to find them.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GUARDIAN_FOREST_07_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GUARDIAN_FOREST_07_CUT.text:
Crivens, that roar reverberated
throughout my whole body.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GUARDIAN_FOREST_07_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GUARDIAN_FOREST_07_CUT.text:
I'm glad I saved it, though,
'cause it seems to be in good health.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GUARDIAN_NEST_02_STONE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GUARDIAN_NEST_02_STONE.text:
From its anatomical features, I conjecture
this is a bat missing its wings.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GUARDIAN_NEST_02_STONE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GUARDIAN_NEST_02_STONE.text:
Hm? It appears to have a walnut in its mouth.
Well, that's proper odd; according to my data,
bats are not known to eat walnuts.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GUARDIAN_NEST_02_STONE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GUARDIAN_NEST_02_STONE.text:
The walnut has been petrified as well, so I'd
only break something if I tried to force it.
Best find some other way, then.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GUARDIAN_NEST_02_STONE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GUARDIAN_NEST_02_STONE.text:
I'd best find a way to reverse
this poor bat's petrification.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GUARDIAN_NEST_02_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GUARDIAN_NEST_02_CUT_0.text:
There, two wings—now it's back to a
proper bat shape. How lovely for you!

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GUARDIAN_NEST_02_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GUARDIAN_NEST_02_CUT_0.text:
Oh, ye want me to have this walnut?
Cheers, love!

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GUARDIAN_NEST_02_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GUARDIAN_NEST_02_CUT_0.text:
I wonder if the squirrel
would fancy this.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GUARDIAN_SWAMP_06_STON.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GUARDIAN_SWAMP_06_STON.text:
It appears to have lost part of its shell.
I cannae tell if that was before or after
it was petrified, but if I can find it,
I'll be sure to bring it back here.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GUARDIAN_SWAMP_06_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GUARDIAN_SWAMP_06_CUT_.text:
Resumption of normal behavior confirmed.
All parameters are within normal range.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GUARDIAN_SWAMP_06_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GUARDIAN_SWAMP_06_CUT_.text:
Your petrification has been lifted.
Ye should be fine now, ye wee turtle!

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GUARDIAN_SWAMP_06_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GUARDIAN_SWAMP_06_CUT_.text: I should move on to the next one.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_SWAMP_01_ROUTE2_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_SWAMP_01_ROUTE2_C.text:
I retrieved the bat wing before the frog
could swallow it, but it was a close thing!

SUB_W19_FUNC_DIVA_PLAT_SWAMP_01_ROUTE2_A.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_FUNC_DIVA_PLAT_SWAMP_01_ROUTE2_A.text:
I cannae recall ever seeing
such a massive frog before!

SUB_W19_FUNC_DIVA_PLAT_SWAMP_01_ROUTE2_A.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_FUNC_DIVA_PLAT_SWAMP_01_ROUTE2_A.text: It's got its eyes on the dragonfly!

SUB_W19_FUNC_DIVA_PLAT_SWAMP_01_ROUTE2_A.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_FUNC_DIVA_PLAT_SWAMP_01_ROUTE2_A.text:
This fellow seems happy to eat anything;
that must be the secret to its growth.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_SWAMP_02_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_SWAMP_02_CUT_000_.text:
Oh, look—animal bones. I bet the fangs
would fit the bear nicely, so I'll just be
taking these along with me.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_SWAMP_02_EARLY_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_SWAMP_02_EARLY_CU.text:
I'll take these animal bones; I may gain
some useful data by analyzing them.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_SWAMP_03_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_SWAMP_03_CUT_000_.text:
Ach! Forgive me for getting so close!
It was not my intention to harm ye,
love—just passing through is all.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_SWAMP_03_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_SWAMP_03_CUT_000_.text:
Hm? Those eggs in your nest...
Those aren't snake eggs!

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_SWAMP_03_CUT_010_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_SWAMP_03_CUT_010_.text:
As I suspected, these are bird eggs.
Perhaps the snake was keeping them
to eat later?

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_SWAMP_03_CUT_010_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_SWAMP_03_CUT_010_.text:
Well, I cannae leave them here to be eaten,
so I'll just pack them along.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_SWAMP_04_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_SWAMP_04_CUT_000_.text:
I retrieved the bat wing before the croc
could swallow it, but it was a close thing!

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_SWAMP_05_ROUTE2_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_SWAMP_05_ROUTE2_C.text:
A beaver. I've never had the chance
to see one make a lodge before.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_SWAMP_05_ROUTE2_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_SWAMP_05_ROUTE2_C.text: Danger! The beaver is being targeted!

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_SWAMP_05_ROUTE2_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_SWAMP_05_ROUTE2_C.text:
I protected the beaver, but don't know
if my actions were morally correct.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_SWAMP_05_ROUTE2_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_SWAMP_05_ROUTE2_C.text:
Aw, the beaver's trying to reassure me!
That's proper kind of ye, love.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_SWAMP_06_ROUTE2_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_SWAMP_06_ROUTE2_C.text:
A dragonfly—but its large size places it
outside the expected range of its species.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_SWAMP_06_ROUTE2_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_SWAMP_06_ROUTE2_C.text:
Since dragonflies are carnivores,
this one should be capable of snapping up
any lesser insects that come this way.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_SWAMP_06_ROUTE2_E.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_SWAMP_06_ROUTE2_E.text:
Is this an acquaintance of yours?
What do ye think, then?

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_SWAMP_06_ROUTE2_E.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_SWAMP_06_ROUTE2_E.text:
Oh, and off they go.
Cheers to ye both!

SUB_W19_FUNC_DIVA_PLAT_NEST_01_AUTO_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_FUNC_DIVA_PLAT_NEST_01_AUTO_CUT_.text:
This spider is considerably larger than
the varieties I'm familiar with.

SUB_W19_FUNC_DIVA_PLAT_NEST_01_AUTO_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_FUNC_DIVA_PLAT_NEST_01_AUTO_CUT_.text:
Eating the likes of me would only get
ye a mouthful of metal, spider.
But to each their own, I suppose.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_NEST_03_CUT_000_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_NEST_03_CUT_000_0.text: A cheery bye to ye, then.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_NEST_03_ROUTE2_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_NEST_03_ROUTE2_CU.text:
There's a walnut inside the anthill.
Perhaps they brought it here from
the place I found the squirrel?

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_NEST_03_ROUTE2_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_NEST_03_ROUTE2_CU.text:
Oh dear, they appear quite cross about
my intrusion. Sorry, ants, but I must
return this to the squirrel.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_NEST_04_CUT_000_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_NEST_04_CUT_000_0.text:
An ant—and it appears to be
staring at me rather intently.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_NEST_04_CUT_000_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_NEST_04_CUT_000_0.text:
This is no safe place
to be climbing, ant.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_NEST_04_CUT_000_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_NEST_04_CUT_000_0.text:
I dinnae see others of your kind around here.
Where have ye come from, then? Let's see if
we can find your anthill together.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_NEST_04_ROUTE2_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_NEST_04_ROUTE2_CU.text:
It appears to be carrying some sort of seed.
If I can find its anthill, there may be
something there for the squirrel to eat.

SUB_W19_FUNC_DIVA_PLAT_NEST_05_AUTO_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_FUNC_DIVA_PLAT_NEST_05_AUTO_CUT_.text:
I estimate a great many bees
live inside this hive.

SUB_W19_FUNC_DIVA_PLAT_NEST_05_AUTO_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_FUNC_DIVA_PLAT_NEST_05_AUTO_CUT_.text: Ach! Bees! All of the bees!

SUB_W19_FUNC_DIVA_PLAT_NEST_05_AUTO_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_FUNC_DIVA_PLAT_NEST_05_AUTO_CUT_.text:
They're so angry with me, though!
What did I ever do to ye!?

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_NEST_05_ROUTE2_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_NEST_05_ROUTE2_CU.text:
Oh! A dragonfly just came
flying out of that beehive!

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_NEST_05_ROUTE2_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_NEST_05_ROUTE2_CU.text:
I thought I saw another dragonfly friend
in the swamp. Let's go see, then.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_NEST_06_CUT_000_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_NEST_06_CUT_000_0.text:
There's a bat wing caught
on that spiderweb!

SUB_W19_FUNC_DIVA_PLAT_NEST_06_ROUTE2_AU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_FUNC_DIVA_PLAT_NEST_06_ROUTE2_AU.text:
A dragonfly's caught in that spiderweb!
I've got to save it before it's eaten!

SUB_W19_FUNC_DIVA_PLAT_NEST_06_ROUTE2_AU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_FUNC_DIVA_PLAT_NEST_06_ROUTE2_AU.text:
Goodness, that was close! I apologize
for not detecting it sooner, love—
let's be more careful going forward.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_01_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_01_CUT_000.text:
These are juvenile wolves.
Hello there.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_01_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_01_CUT_000.text:
Oh, is that a piece of shell?
The pups must have brought it
back here as a plaything.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_01_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_01_CUT_000.text: Apologies, pups, but I need that.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_01_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_01_CUT_000.text:
Hopefully this will let me lift the
petrification from the wee turtle.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_02_ROUTE2_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_02_ROUTE2_.text:
I suspect I can find something good
in this cave. Let's go and see.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_02_ROUTE2_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_02_ROUTE2_.text:
This is some creature's den!
Oh, and it's a proper mess, too.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_02_ROUTE2_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_02_ROUTE2_.text:
Let's see. According to my sensors,
there's something right about there...

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_02_ROUTE2_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_02_ROUTE2_.text: Bear fangs detected! I'll take those.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_02_ROUTE2_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_02_ROUTE2_.text:
There doesn't seem to be anything
of interest in this cave.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_02_ROUTE2_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_02_ROUTE2_.text:
My sensors are only detecting
the presence of fiends here.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_02_ROUTE2_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_02_ROUTE2_.text: I'll search a wee bit further.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_02_ROUTE2_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_02_ROUTE2_.text:
A dead end. As I suspected,
there's nothing here.

SUB_W19_FUNC_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_03_AUTO_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_FUNC_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_03_AUTO_CU.text:
This carnivorous plant could likely
consume a small animal, but I expect
it primarily feeds on insects.

SUB_W19_FUNC_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_03_AUTO_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_FUNC_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_03_AUTO_CU.text: My friend here was nearly eaten!

SUB_W19_FUNC_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_03_AUTO_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_FUNC_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_03_AUTO_CU.text:
I'd best be more careful when passing
through here with an insect friend.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_03_ROUTE2_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_03_ROUTE2_.text:
This carnivorous plant
poses no risk to me.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_03_ROUTE2_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_03_ROUTE2_.text:
Oh? There's something in its mouth.
Let's take a closer look, then!

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_03_ROUTE2_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_03_ROUTE2_.text:
Ach! Even if ye could eat me,
I assure you I taste wretched!

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_03_ROUTE2_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_03_ROUTE2_.text:
I should bring this bit of shell
back to the wee turtle.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_03_ROUTE2_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_03_ROUTE2_.text:
A piece of shell—from a turtle,
mostlike. It must have fallen here.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_04_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_04_CUT_000.text:
This bird's nest has brown
feathers strewn about.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_04_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_04_CUT_000.text:
Hmm? There's a shed snakeskin here.
Perhaps a snake ate the bird or was
staking out its nest?

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_04_EGGS_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_04_EGGS_CU.text:
I returned the stolen eggs,
but what happened to the parent bird?

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_04_EGGS_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_04_EGGS_CU.text:
There's no evidence it was eaten
by the snake, so it should be nearby.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_04_CUCKOO_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_04_CUCKOO_.text:
You're returned to your nest, love—
and your eggs are right there!

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_04_CUCKOO_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_04_CUCKOO_.text:
Ye threw the eggs out of the nest!
I guess it wasn't your nest after all.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_04_CUCKOO_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_04_CUCKOO_.text: So sorry... That was my own fault.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_04_OWL_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_04_OWL_CUT.text:
It's begun warming the eggs.
Clearly this is the parent.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_04_OWL_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_04_OWL_CUT.text:
I'm so glad ye were able to reunite with
your eggs, love. A cheery bye to ye!

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_05_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_05_CUT_000.text: Ye must be the mother of those eggs.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_05_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_05_CUT_000.text:
Ye seem to be in quite the tizzy,
but it wasn't me who nicked your eggs.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_05_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_05_CUT_000.text: This bird's plumage is grey and white.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_05_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_05_CUT_000.text: Should I lead it to the nest?

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_06_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_06_CUT_000.text:
That poor bird seems terribly sad. 
Maybe because it lost its eggs?

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_06_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_06_CUT_000.text: It has brown and beige plumage.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_07_ROUTE2_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_07_ROUTE2_.text:
Oh, but that deer looks terribly excited.
Just look at it swing those antlers around!

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_07_ROUTE2_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_07_ROUTE2_.text:
Ach! There's a bat wing stuck on the tip
of an antler! Poor thing must be trying
to shake it free.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_07_ROUTE2_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_07_ROUTE2_.text:
It's all right now, love.
I got that wing off ye.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_07_ROUTE2_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_07_ROUTE2_.text:
But bats have two wings,
so I still need one more.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_07_ROUTE2_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_FOREST_07_ROUTE2_.text:
That's both of the wings!
Now to take them back to the bat.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GUARDIAN_FOREST_04_EAR.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_GUARDIAN_FOREST_04_EAR.text: Perhaps it wants one of the seeds I found?

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_NEST_03_ROUTE2_EA.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_NEST_03_ROUTE2_EA.text: Would ye look at that: a walnut. Perhaps one of the animal friends here would like it.

SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_NEST_04_ROUTE2_EA.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W19_EVAR_DIVA_PLAT_NEST_04_ROUTE2_EA.text: It appears to be carry a wee bit of seeds. Likely many more to be found at their colony.
